Vignette version number

Source: R/gss_vars_210.R
vigversn.Rd

vigversn

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question Next I'm going to describe a person – lets call him/her (REFER TO NAME IN VIGNETTE). After I read a description of him/her I'll ask you some questions about how you think and feel about him/her. There are no right or wrong answers. I'm only interested in what you think of NAME.
